message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but $14000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16000. Would that work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $15500?
I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $16250. This is as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable going above $15000. Would you be willing to meet me at $15000?
